description:
Ogino requires the help of Hiroshi to take down Don’s genius doctor.   An Onsen is always neutral territory for rival groups.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tensai Tag Kessoku Jiken / Ianryokou Gokuraku Jiken
The Genius Tag Team Case / The Pleasure Trip Paradise Case
天才タッグ結束事件 / 慰安旅行極楽事件
